record.title: CONDITIONAL ADJOURNMENT OR RECESS OF THE HOUSE AND SENATE

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate proceed to H. Con. Res. 179, the adjournment resolution.

record.chair: The clerk will report the concurrent resolution by title.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the concurrent resolution be agreed to and the motion to reconsider be laid upon the table.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
